results.title: Normalization of Testicular Steroidogenesis and Spermatogenesis in Male Rats with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus under the Conditions of Metformin Therapy.
results.text_hl: Normalization of Testicular Steroidogenesis and Spermatogenesis in Male @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rats@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus@@@ under the Conditions of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ Therapy.

results.title: Probiotics Combined with Metformin Improves Sperm Parameters in Obese Male Mice through Modulation of Intestinal Microbiota Equilibrium.
results.text_hl: Our results revealed that high-@CHEMICAL_Fats @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005223 @@@fat@@@ diet would result in reduced testicular spermatogenic tubule hierarchy, decreased spermatogenic cell counts, decreased sperm concentration and motility, and altered abundance of intestinal microbiota, whereas the combination of probiotics and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ could restore high-@CHEMICAL_Fats @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005223 @@@fat@@@-mediated pathophysiological alterations thereby ameliorating @<m>DISEASE_Spermatogenic_Failure_Nonobstructive_Y_Linked</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564030 @@@spermatogenic disorders@@@ in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Liu D, Han X, Zou W, Yang Z, Peng J, Li Y, Liu Y, Jia M, Liu W, Li H, Zhou Q, Tan Z, Zhang J. Probiotics Combined with Metformin Improves Sperm Parameters in Obese Male Mice through Modulation of Intestinal Microbiota Equilibrium. Reprod Sci. 2024 Dec 2;():. PMID: 39623123
